name: The Inquisitor (itch)
description:
Space to enter camera movement mode.

Bribe people to increase loyalty.

Burn those who are heretics.

Beware to lose sanity or influence.

Use gold to hire agents.

Drag'n'drop them between cities (via a buffer on the bottom of screen)

They can spot rituals and die trying to save the world!

The more influence you've got - by kiling the right people, the more important guys can be burned!

Enjoy :D
